sys_properties_category.title:
System Properties & Details for Idea Box

An Idea Box is a collaborative space for sharing ideas and questions. Once an Idea is posted, other users can share their feelings and feedback by voting & commenting on both the Idea and others' feedback. Based on that collaboration, great Ideas and solutions bubble to the top where they have greater visibility and may be acted upon. It's great for gauging demand for new projects, accepting organizational feedback, seeking technical assistance, or just planning lunch!

Create as many Idea Boxes as you need for whatever topics or occasions require them - each is accessible separately via the main UI at:

https://[instance].service-now.com/x_snc_idea_box_ideabox_home.do

Notes:

  • To link directly to a specific Box, use the URL:
    https://[instance].service-now.com/x_snc_idea_box_ideabox_home.do?sysparm_sys_id=[box_sys_id]
  • To link directly to the 'All Posts' page, use the URL:
    https://[instance].service-now.com/x_snc_idea_box_ideabox_home.do?sysparm_sys_id=allposts
  • To link directly to a specific Idea posting, use the URL:
    https://[instance].service-now.com/x_snc_idea_box_ideabox_home.do?sysparm_post_id=[idea_sys_id]
  • Or, just scroll to the bottom of any Box or Idea and click 'Copy Link' to get the URL for that item.

Use these URLs in modules, bookmarks, emails, or wherever else is convenient for your users.

Assign the role of 'x_snc_idea_box.ideabox_admin' to administrators of the Idea Box application. Administrators can edit & delete any Idea Box record and may add Badges to any Idea post.

In the left nav:

  • Launch Idea Box: Launch the main UI
  • Boxes: The parent Idea Box - essentially, it's own 'forum' (visible to Idea Box admin)
  • Ideas: All Ideas that have been submitted (visible to Idea Box admin)
  • Comments: All Comments that have been left (visible to Idea Box admin)
  • Votes: All Votes submitted for all Ideas & Comments (visible to Idea Box admin)
  • Properties: Details and Properties of this application (visible to full admin)

In the app:

  • Click the Idea Box title to select an existing or create a new Idea Box.
    • Ability to view a Box is determined by roles configured on the Box record.
    • Ability to create new Boxes is determined by roles configured in Properties.
  • To search, type a term and then press Enter or change sort order to initiate.
  • Sort order:
    • Newest: Newest up top
    • Popular: Highest score (upvotes - downvotes) up top
    • Hottest: Most recently commented up top
  • Click Create Post to create a new post within the current Box.
    • Ability to create new Posts is determined by roles configured on Box record.
  • Click Edit Post or Edit Box to edit an existing item.
    • At the Comment level, click the comment text to edit.
    • Ability to edit is determined by 'write' access controls on the Box, Idea, and Comments tables. By default, admins, creators, and Box moderators are granted ability to edit.
    • Admins & Box moderators can add colored Badges to Ideas to denote a certain state, like 'Answered' or 'Promoted to Development'.
    • Admins & Box moderators can pin Ideas to the top of their respective Idea Box, to ensure they have maximal visibility.
  • Click the Subscribe icon to enable/disable email notifications on new posts/comments for that item.
  • Click the up/down arrows to tell folks how you feel about any post.
    • Each person can only upvote or downvote a post once, but you can always change your vote.
  • Click the post title or comments link to view the details of a post and comments.
